6.1d Homework: Transitioning from Numeric Expressions to Algebraic Expressions

1.

Ali bikes 12 miles per hour.

Write different expressions to represent the distance Ali bikes based on the number of hours she bikes for.

Number of Hours Ali Bikes Distance Ali Bikes (in miles) Expression 1 Distance Ali Bikes (in miles) Expression 2 Distance Ali Bikes (in miles) Expression 3

\(5\)
